1: I trust in your guidance and care for all.
2: I cherish and support my community, thriving together in unity.
3: I rise above challenges and embrace my inner strength.
4: I stand strong in unity despite challenges around me.
5: I gain respect by taking bold action in my endeavors.
6: They skillfully create beauty with tools and determination.
7: I rise above challenges and protect what is sacred.
8: We come together to build a brighter future.
9: I embrace the present and seek understanding in all things.
10: I trust in divine strength and embrace hope in my journey.
11: I actively embrace the support and guidance around me.
12: God is my King, bringing salvation to the world.
13: I embrace strength that brings triumph over challenges.
14: You provide for those in need through powerful victories.
15: I see powerful rivers transformed into dry land.
16: Today and tonight, I embrace the light and warmth around me.
17: The world is perfectly balanced with seasons bringing beauty and change.
18: I rise above disrespect and remain steadfast in my faith.
19: I care for the vulnerable and support those in need.
20: I uphold my commitments and create a kinder world.
21: I uplift the oppressed and celebrate the joy of the needy.
22: I stand up for what is right and just.
23: I stay aware of challenges that strengthen my resolve.
